pardot_business_unit_id.description: Pardot Business ID, can be found at Setup>Pardot>Pardot Account Setup.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Consumer Key that can be found when viewing your app in Salesforce.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Consumer Secret that can be found when viewing your app in Salesforce.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Salesforce Refresh Token used for Airbyte to access your Salesforce account. See guide for more information on how to obtain this token.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated. Leave blank to skip this filter.

is_sandbox.title: Is Sandbox
is_sandbox.description: Whether or not the the app is in a Salesforce sandbox. If you do not know what this, assume it is false.
